TopicTitle: Better cats than rats! Red Dwarf TV Series

Articles.Content:
So has anyone else watch this quirky show. Was reminiscing on the tube.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vifT47z9cCE#t=1441s](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vifT47z9cCE#t=1441s)

This is the first episode.

[Cats are cool, dangerous and fearsome!](https://youtu.be/vifT47z9cCE?t=24m13s)

If you have a favorite episode post it.

Season 7 episode 6: Beyond a joke:

http://https//www.youtube.com/watch?v=Njtk6SPsBTU

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Njtk6SPsBTU

More specifically, this scene (skip to 1:20 to start the funny part):

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7x6h96zs0Xc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Our world application note: Mod to develop Unleash Kraken by remote to get little Billy to come for supper.

Out of all the episodes which I have watched, was sure I saw them all, then you go and pick one I never. Well done.

Was trying to add rep to [**Vaporo**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/113857-Vaporo) 

 but no button to add rep.![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-15T16:37:54Z" title="03/15/2015 04:37  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 15, 2015</time> by MoeslyArmlis**

I may or may not have seen an episode or two ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

 I can't really pick out a favorite.

Best,

-Slashy
Nice catch vaporo ; ) w w game and you here ; ) hehe
